entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
